title: The Pudding is Hiring our Seventh Team Member
description: The Pudding’s in-house brand creative agency, Polygraph, is hiring a full-time Journalist-Engineer to work on paid projects. The job is to work with other organizations to tell visual, data-led stories, which you’ll design and code.
